text: Chisimu M'mbuje gwenu ni Allah Ajula juwagumbile mawunde ni mataka m'mowa nsano nalimo, kaneka ni jwatenjele pa Arishi (Chindanda Chaulungu). Akuchitendaga chilo kuwa chakuwuunichila muusi ni chikasaukuyaga mwa chitemachitema (iyyopeyo soni muusi kuchiunichila chilo ni ukasachikuyaga mwa chitemachitema), soni (agumbile) lyuwa ni mwesi kwisa soni ndondwa, (yosope) ijepepasyidwe kwa (kuya) chilamusi Chakwe. Manyililani yanti gumba ni Kwakwe kwisa soni ulamusi, anyakwiche Allah (pa uchimbichimbi ni upile) M'mbuje jwa iwumbe (yosope)
